dialogHeader.label: Before you apply, you will need:
In order to proceed with this application:
To make things easier for you we now provide

dialogbusinessTerm.label: You are a New Zealand resident and have a NZ working visa and are 18 or older.
The minimum amount to be financed is $10,000
You are not currently bankrupt or have a history of credit defaults
You confirm the UDC Privacy Statement applies to your application
Your application is subject to UDC's credit approval process. Lending criteria apply

dialogbusinessCheckBox.label: By ticking on this box, you confirm that you are applying for a business loan with UDC finance limited, each of the following statements is correct and you agree that the UDC Privacy Statement applies to your application.

iconListBusiness.imgName: Your current New Zealand full or restricted Driver License

iconListIndivisual.imgName: Your current New Zealand full or restricted Driver License
Details of your income, expenses, assets & liabilities

dialogIndivisualTerm.label: You must be a New Zealand citizen or have a New Zealand resident visa and you must be at least 18 years old.
The loan amount you are applying for must be at least $10,000

indivisualCheckBox.label: By ticking on this box, you confirm that:

indivisualUnoderList.label: You meet each of the requirements set out above
you have read UDC's Privacy Statement and you understand that it applies to your loan application
you have read UDC's Financial Advice Statement and you understand that any recommendations made by UDC inrelation to your loan are not regulated financial advice
You understand that UDC's lending criteria applies to this loan application
